roleset.name: dissolve out soluble constitents from by percolation

role.descr: soluble constituents, product of leaching process
source from which arg1 is drawn, pure substance undergoing percolation

example.name: All Arguments
example.text: Animal protein is high in sulfur which-1 *T*-1 can leach calcium from the bones and form kidney stones.
